**What / Why**
One sentence: what changed and why.

**Changes**
- Short bullet list of noteworthy changes.

**Testing/Validation**
- List of tests added/changed
- Any manual validation performed (logs/snippets)

**Checklist before merge**
- [ ] Build OK with strict flags
- [ ] PR title follows Conventional Commits.
- [ ] All tests pass and/or validation seems sane
- [ ] Logs/metrics make sense
- [ ] README/ROADMAP/CHANGELOG/DESIGN docs touched (if needed)
